meanings.definition: To expel gas loudly from the stomach through the mouth.
meanings.sent1: After drinking soda quickly, he belches loudly in class.
meanings.sent3: The dog belches after eating too fast, amusing everyone around.
meanings.sent4: The old car engine belches smoke as it struggles to start.
meanings.sent5: The volcano belches ash and smoke into the sky, creating a spectacular sight.

meanings.definition: A loud expulsion of gas from the stomach through the mouth.
meanings.sent1: The loud belches during the meeting were embarrassing.
meanings.sent2: She stifled a belch during the fancy dinner.
meanings.sent3: The belch from the baby sounded surprisingly musical.
meanings.sent4: The belch of thunder signaled the start of the storm.
meanings.sent5: The belch of laughter echoed through the room, bringing smiles to everyone.
